faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Curious about online order integrations or how our platform works? Have a look through the frequently asked questions below, or get in touch with us via our contact page.

whyWasla.title: Why should I choose Wasla?
whyWasla.answer: because it directly connects operations to revenue. By fully managing delivery platforms, Wasla reduces cancellations caused by menu errors, availability issues, pricing mistakes, and delayed fulfillment protecting orders before revenue is lost. Every operational decision is tied to increasing completed orders and improving profit per order, so merchants see higher revenue, fewer failures, and consistent performance across all branches
whyWasla.link: Book a 1-on-1 with our team to learn more.

increaseSales.title: How does Wasla help increase my store's sales?
increaseSales.answer: We analyze your store's performance across all delivery apps, identify opportunities to optimize your menu and pricing, and manage promotions to boost visibility and sales. Additionally, we negotiate with apps to reduce costs and maximize your net profit

suitableForAll.title: Are Wasla's services suitable for all types of stores?
suitableForAll.answer: Yes, we provide tailored solutions for restaurants, cafes, retail shops, and beauty stores. Our strategies are based on detailed data analysis to ensure each store achieves the best results on all platforms.

trackPerformance.title: How can I track my store's performance with Wasla?
trackPerformance.answer: We provide weekly detailed reports for each branch, including order counts, revenue, completed and canceled orders, and average order value. All data is presented clearly to help you make quick and strategic business decisions.

questions.multiMonthAnswer: When you purchase longer subscription periods, you automatically receive discounts. The discount is applied automatically at checkout based on the subscription length you choose.
questions.upgradePlan: Can I upgrade my plan later?
questions.upgradeAnswer: Yes! You can upgrade to a higher tier at any time. Your new subscription will start after your current subscription expires, ensuring you don't lose any paid time.
questions.subscriptionExpires: What happens when my subscription expires?
questions.expiresAnswer: When your subscription expires, you'll lose access to your analytics dashboard. However, you can renew at any time to regain access. All your data is safely stored and will be available when you resubscribe.
questions.refundsAnswer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee on all new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team within 7 days of purchase for a full refund.

index.title: Wasla - Powering Greater Growth
index.topBar: Schedule a demo and learn how Wasla can help you

hero.subtitle: End-to-end delivery management with Measurable growth
hero.title: Powering Greater Growth FOOD ORDERING
hero.description: We help restaurants scale faster and more profitably on delivery platforms. By managing and optimizing every step from multi-app presence and menu performance to pricing, commissions, and reporting Wasla ensures orders convert, fulfill, and scale efficiently. Our data-driven, platform-native approach simplifies operations across all delivery channels, giving brands full visibility, stronger margins, and consistent performance across every branch.

logos.title: FUELLING THE FASTEST GROWING FOOD BUSINESSES with integrations

efficiency.label: END-TO-END DELIVERY PERFORMANCE
efficiency.title: RESULTS. NOT REPORTS
efficiency.description: Wasla fully manages your presence across delivery platforms to drive measurable growth and profitability. We take complete ownership from performance optimization to platform decisions aligning every action with revenue, margin, and reliability KPIs. With one accountable partner instead of multiple vendors, brands gain control, consistency, and stronger results across every branch.

performance.label: HIGHER PERFORMANCE
performance.title: TURN VISIBILITY INTO ORDERS
performance.description: Increase completed orders through strategic menu optimization and data-led platform management. Wasla improves how your brand appears, prices, and performs across delivery apps, using performance data to reduce drop-offs and cancellations while driving repeat orders and sustainable growth.
performance.metricsSubtitle: Track and optimize your delivery success

video.label: PLATFORM WALKTHROUGH
video.title: SEE WASLA IN ACTION
video.description: Watch a quick overview of Wasla to see how restaurants and food service brands use our delivery performance management services to streamline operations, improve profitability, and scale across delivery platforms with confidence

hero.title: Simplify your digital operations with flexibility and full oversight
hero.subtitle: Automate order processing, centralize menu management, and control your digital operations across every channel reliably, globally, and in real time.

orderManagement.title: Order Management
orderManagement.description: Send orders straight to your POS with live status syncing. No manual work, no missed orders, no blind spots.

menuManagement.title: Menu, Store & Stock Management
menuManagement.description: Push menu updates to all your channels from one place. Snooze products, sync stock, and schedule changes.

dataReporting.title: Consolidated Data & Reporting
dataReporting.description: Fix what doesn't. Track revenue, cancellations, failed orders, and performance. Make decisions based on data, not guesswork.

optimization.title: Optimize for profitability
optimization.description: Utilize analytics dashboards to adjust your offerings, promotions, and marketing strategies effectively.

steps.text: ALL delivery channels in one dashboard
clear insights that turn data into executive decisions.
menu structuring and pricing to increase conversion rates and maximize ROI.
Boost visibility and order volume without sacrificing profit margins

steps.accent: One service to run it all
steps.text: Wasla becomes the digital command center for your restaurant operations.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Restaurant Brands
enterprise.description: Run ops across 52+ countries with 99.9% uptime and custom integrations. Handle complexity without slowdowns; boost efficiency, cut risks, and drive enterprise-level profits.

cloudKitchens.title: cloud Kitchens
cloudKitchens.description: Streamline multi-channel ops without extra hassle, and optimize for high-speed delivery.

multiLocation.title: Multi-location chains
multiLocation.description: Update menus, opening hours, and reports across all sites in seconds, while keeping branding consistent.

We work alongside you to turn delivery into a predictable growth channel.
